III.ii.1.B.7.a
.
When ROs Should Fax Requests for Disability Records to SSA
The
SSA-GSO website
referenced in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 1.B.2
must be the primary method for requesting records from SSA.
ROs must attempt to request records through the
SSA-GSO website
before using the alternative fax method.Â  Fax requests for disability records to SSA
only if
the
SSA-GSO website
is inaccessible or inoperable for an
extended
period of time.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Requests for Information From the Social Security Administration (SSA)
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
